SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.accountinformation

Class AccountDAO

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.accountinformation.AccountDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Account>, DAO<Account>
public class AccountDAO extends Object implements DAO<Account>
Provides access to account data stored in the database. This class implements the DAO interface for the Account class. It is a singleton class with instance methods for performing create, read, update and delete operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an AccountDAO instance, initializing the EntityManagerFactory and EntityManager.

      public void add(Account account)
      Adds a new account to the database if it does not already exist.
      Specified by:
      add in interface DAO<Account>
      Parameters:
      account - the account to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the account already exists.
      IllegalArgumentException - if an account with the same account number exists.
      IllegalArgumentException - if an account with the same email exists.
